This technique combines ninjutsu, chemistry, and medical knowledge, thus requiring fine [[chakra]] control and advanced ability in [[medical ninjutsu]]. The user converts chakra in their body into a special chemical that they then exhale from their mouth. When the chemical comes into contact with the air, it becomes a cloud of poison. Breathing in even a small amount of the poison will cause immediate death.<ref name=d2/>

The Poison Mist used by [[Ibuse]] differs from that used by [[Shizune]]. Rather than kill those that inhale it, Ibuse's causes victims to become paralysed after only a few seconds, allowing [[Hanzō]] to attack them at his leisure with his [[Wikipedia:Kusarigama|kusarigama]]. Ibuse must first generate and store the poison within his body for five minutes before he can use it.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 531, page 8</ref>

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja 3]]'', almost every character can use this technique by finding a Poison Book for Shizune.
* In ''[[Ultimate Ninja Storm 3]]'', "[[Ibuse's Poison Mist]]" is part of [[Hanzō]]'s moveset.
